statements: UPDATE video_performance_reports SET views = 100, clicks = 20 WHERE report_id = 1
UPDATE video_performance_reports SET conversions = 5, views = 120, clicks = 25 WHERE report_id = 2
UPDATE video_performance_reports SET views = 1000, clicks = 200, conversions = 50 WHERE video_id = 123 AND date = '2021-10-20';
UPDATE video_performance_reports SET clicks = 150, conversions = 30, views = 800 WHERE date = '2021-11-15' AND video_id = 456;
UPDATE VideoPerformanceReports SET likes_count = 500 WHERE video_id = 123;
UPDATE VideoCampaignMetrics SET marketing_cost = 2500.75, clicks_count = 1000 WHERE campaign_id = 456;
UPDATE VideoPerformanceReports SET views_count = 500, likes_count = 200 WHERE video_id = 123;
UPDATE VideoCampaignMetrics SET clicks_count = 1000, conversion_rate = 0.05 WHERE campaign_id = 456;
UPDATE video_performance_reports SET views = 100, clicks = 20 WHERE report_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE video_metadata SET description = 'New Description', title = 'New Title' WHERE video_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-cdef-123456789012';
UPDATE video_performance_reports SET views = views + 100, clicks = clicks + 10 WHERE report_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE video_metadata SET duration = duration * 2, title = 'New Updated Title' WHERE video_id = 'c8874559-6038-41fa-ae8b-99b3cbdbf58a';
UPDATE VideoPerformanceReports SET likes_count = 100 WHERE video_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE MarketingStrategies SET platform = 'YouTube', end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE strategy_id = '87654321-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE VideoPerformanceReports SET likes_count = likes_count + 1, dislikes_count = dislikes_count - 1 WHERE video_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE MarketingStrategies SET end_date = '2023-12-31', strategy_name = 'New Campaign' WHERE strategy_id = 'a7c96365-48aa-4d3b-99ee-fd23d055d937'
UPDATE video_performance_reports SET performance_value = 8.75 WHERE report_id = 101;
UPDATE engagement_metrics SET engagement_level = 'High' WHERE metric_id = 205;
UPDATE video_performance_reports SET performance_value = 8.7, performance_metric = 'Engagement' WHERE report_id = 101;
UPDATE videos SET duration = 120, category = 'Documentary' WHERE video_id = 201;
